meanings.definition: An abnormal outgrowth or enlargement of a part of the body.
meanings.sent1: The excrescence on the tree trunk looked strange.
meanings.sent2: The doctor removed the excrescence from the patient's skin.
meanings.sent3: The excrescence on the potato made it resemble a tiny alien.
meanings.sent4: The excrescence of corruption in society must be eradicated.
meanings.sent5: The excrescence on the rock face was a stark contrast to its smooth surface.

meanings.sent1: The excrescence of graffiti on the wall ruined its beauty.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed by the excrescence of a pimple on her nose.
meanings.sent3: The excrescence of a random sticker on his laptop made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The excrescence of lies in his speech was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The excrescence of mold on the bread made it inedible.
